name: wid2_CATI1_module1
label: CATI 1: household questionnaire (CATI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: contact and contact frequency to biological parents, twins, siblings not living in the household (anymore).

ptyp_hq.question: ptyp_hq
ptyp_hq.name: ptyp_hq
ptyp_hq.label: My name is ... from TNS Infratest Sozialforschung. I'm calling because of the twin family study 'TwinLife' which is conducted by Infratest Sozialforschung on behalf of University of Bielefeld and University of Saarland.

items.name: ptyp_hq
items.text: My name is ... from TNS Infratest Sozialforschung. I'm calling because of the twin family study 'TwinLife' which is conducted by Infratest Sozialforschung on behalf of University of Bielefeld and University of Saarland.
items.text_de:
Guten Tag mein Name ist .... von TNS Infratest Sozialforschung.
Es geht um die Zwillingsfamilien-Studie 'TwinLife', die TNS Infratest Sozialforschung im
Auftrag der Universitaeten Bielefeld und des Saarlandes durchfuehrt.
Spreche ich jetzt mit ...?

answers.label: 110: partner of first interviewed twin - p
120: partner of second interviewed twin - q

con0301s.question: con0301s
con0301s.name: con0301s
con0301s.label: How often has <name sibling> seen <name mother> in the past 6 months or since moving out?

items.name: con0301s
items.text: How often has <name sibling> seen <name mother> in the past 6 months or since moving out?
items.text_de:
Wie haeufig [hat <Name Zwilling 1> / <Name Zwilling 2> / <Name Zielgeschwister> /
<haben Sie>] in den letzten 6 Monaten bzw. seit Auszug <Name ausserhaeusige Person>
gesehen?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Panel analysis of intimate relationships and family dynamics (pairfam): Pairfam Codebook Child Wave 3 2010/11
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Beziehungs- und Familienpanel (pairfam): Pairfam Codebuch Kind Welle 3 2010/11

answers.label: 2: once or several times in the last six month
answers.label_de: 2: ein oder mehrmals im halben Jahr

con0304s.question: con0304s
con0304s.name: con0304s
con0304s.label: How often has <name sibling> been in contact with <name mother> in the past 6 months or since moving out, for example by phone, mail, etc.?

items.name: con0304s
items.text: How often has <name sibling> been in contact with <name mother> in the past 6 months or since moving out, for example by phone, mail, etc.?
items.text_de:
Wie haeufig [hat <Name Zwilling 1> / <Name Zwilling 2> / <Name Zielgeschwister> /
<haben Sie>] in den letzten 6 Monaten bzw. seit Auszug mit <Name ausserhaeusige
Person> Kontakt gehabt, z.B. per Telefon, Email etc.? Persoenliche Treffen sind hiermit
nicht gemeint.

items.name: con0404u
items.text: How often has <name twin2> been in contact with <name father> in the past 6 months or since moving out, for example by phone, mail, etc.?
items.text_de:
Wie haeufig [hat <Name Zwilling 1> / <Name Zwilling 2> / <Name Zielgeschwister> /
<haben Sie>] in den letzten 6 Monaten bzw. seit Auszug mit <Name ausserhaeusige
Person> Kontakt gehabt, z.B. per Telefon, Email etc.? Persoenliche Treffen sind hiermit
nicht gemeint.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Panel analysis of intimate relationships and family dynamics (pairfam): Pairfam Codebook Child Wave 3 2010/11
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Beziehungs- und Familienpanel (pairfam): Pairfam Codebuch Kind Welle 3 2010/11

answers.label: 2: once or several times in the last six month
answers.label_de: 2: ein oder mehrmals im halben Jahr

con0405s.question: con0405s
con0405s.name: con0405s
con0405s.label: When was <name sibling> in contact with <name father> the last time?

items.name: con0405s
items.text: When was <name sibling> in contact with <name father> the last time?
items.text_de:
Wann [hatte <Name Zwilling 1> / <Name Zwilling 2> / <Name Zielgeschwister> /
<hatten Sie>]den letzten Kontakt zu <Name ausserhaeusige Person>?
